Container.Name: unimus
Container.Overview: Unimus is a multi-vendor network device configuration backup and management solution, designed from the ground up with user friendliness, workflow optimization and ease-of-use in mind. You can get a free 5-device license at https://unimus.net/

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
